languages.text: "Да и деньги вроде есть... Вот бы в этом году подать за пустотные щиты не поднимали! Тогда хоть каждые полгода новое платье можно шить".
"And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."
languages.original_text: "Да и деньги вроде есть... Вот бы в этом году подать за пустотные щиты не поднимали! Тогда хоть каждые полгода новое платье можно шить".

traits.locale_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."
"And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."
"And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."
"And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."
"And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

languages.text: “而且我们花钱一直花得很节省，我猜……我真的希望他们今年别再涨虚空护盾税了！这样一来，如果你乐意，就可以每隔半年都织件新衣服了。”
languages.original_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

traits.locale_text: “而且我们花钱一直花得很节省，我猜……我真的希望他们今年别再涨虚空护盾税了！这样一来，如果你乐意，就可以每隔半年都织件新衣服了。”

languages.text: «Y, en temas económicos, no vamos mal, supongo... ¡Espero que este año no suban los impuestos del escudo de vacío! Porque, si no, a lo sumo, podrías diseñar dos vestidos nuevos al año».
languages.original_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

traits.locale_text: «Y, en temas económicos, no vamos mal, supongo... ¡Espero que este año no suban los impuestos del escudo de vacío! Porque, si no, a lo sumo, podrías diseñar dos vestidos nuevos al año».

languages.text: 「それに、金銭的にも困ってないし…今年はヴォイドシールド税が上げらないことを願うね！それなら半年おきにドレスを新調しても全然かまわないよ」
languages.original_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、金銭的にも困ってないし…今年はヴォイドシールド税が上げらないことを願うね！それなら半年おきにドレスを新調しても全然かまわないよ」

languages.text: "Und geldmäßig geht es uns gut, nehme ich an ... Ich hoffe wirklich, dass sie dieses Jahr die Deflektorschild-Steuer nicht erhöhen! Dann könntet Ihr zweimal im Jahr ein neues Kleid nähen, wenn Ihr wollt."
languages.original_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

traits.locale_text: "Und geldmäßig geht es uns gut, nehme ich an ... Ich hoffe wirklich, dass sie dieses Jahr die Deflektorschild-Steuer nicht erhöhen! Dann könntet Ihr zweimal im Jahr ein neues Kleid nähen, wenn Ihr wollt."

languages.text: « Et puis on n'a pas de problèmes d'argent, pour l'instant... J'espère juste que la taxe sur les boucliers Void va pas encore augmenter ! Comme ça, tu pourras coudre une nouvelle robe tous les six mois, si tu veux. »
languages.original_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

traits.locale_text: « Et puis on n'a pas de problèmes d'argent, pour l'instant... J'espère juste que la taxe sur les boucliers Void va pas encore augmenter ! Comme ça, tu pourras coudre une nouvelle robe tous les six mois, si tu veux. »

languages.text: "Parasal olarak da fena durumda sayılmayız zaten. Umarım bu yıl uçsuz kalkanı vergisini daha da artırmazlar! Artacak olursa yılda ancak iki kez yeni elbise dikebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "And we're doing fine money-wise, I suppose... I really hope they don't raise the void shield tax this year! Then you could sew a new dress every half a year if you liked."

traits.locale_text: "Parasal olarak da fena durumda sayılmayız zaten. Umarım bu yıl uçsuz kalkanı vergisini daha da artırmazlar! Öyle bir durumda yılda ancak iki kere yeni bir elbise dikebilirsin."
